pageProduct.name: Simple Kind To Skin Facial Scrub Smoothing 75ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SIMPLE KIND TO SKIN FACIAL CLEANSER SMOOTH SCRUB 75 ML

Simple Kind To Skin Smoothing Facial Scrub is a perfect blend of active ingredients and vitamin goodness that works to remove dead skin cells and keep your skin brighter and more textured. Perfect for even sensitive skin. Our special blend of Simple cleansing goodness containing Pro-Vitamin B5, Vitamin E and Rice Granules, helps to gently exfoliate and improve skin condition. For best results: Apply a small amount to damp face and neck. Massage in circular movements with fingertips avoiding the eye area. Rinse away with plenty of water. Use once a week on normal/dry skin and twice a week on oily skin. Simple have been the experts in sensitive skin since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We've stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skincare products suitable for all skin types and as our product range has grown. For over 50 years, we've pioneered a kinder approach to skin. In fact, it's become something of an obsession. Over time we've really got to understand skin; what it does and the everyday challenges it faces. We've learnt that when something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care. For more information visit: http://www.simpleskincare.com.au

Boxed Contents: 150ml

Size: 150ml

KEY FEATURES

• Quickly and gently removes dead skin cells keeping your skin revived and revitalised
• With moisturising Vitamin E to improve skin condition
• Use once a week on normal/dry skin and twice a week on oily skin
• Dermatologically tested
• Perfect for sensitive skin
• No artificial colours, perfume, or harsh chemicals that can upset your skin

Ingredients

Aqua, Mineral Oil, Coco-Glucoside, Hydrated Silica, Oryza Sativa Germ Powder, Acrylates Copolymer, Vegetable oil, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Dipropylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Panthenol, Pantolactone, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Sodium hydroxide, Sodium Hydroxymethylglycinate, Tocopheryl Acetate
